shortdesc.ph: Gets the total duration of the music file.
Gets the total duration of the music file.
Gets the total duration of the music file.
Gets the total duration of the music file.

section.p: This method gets the total duration of the music file in milliseconds.
This method gets the total duration of the music file, in milliseconds.
This method gets the total duration of the music file, in milliseconds.
This method gets the total duration of the music file, in milliseconds.

section.title: Timing
section.p: You must call this method after and receiving the onAudioMixingStateChanged(AudioMixingStatePlaying) callback.
You need to call this method after and receiving the onAudioMixingStateChanged(AudioMixingStatePlaying) callback.
You need to call this method after and receiving the onAudioMixingStateChanged(audioMixingStatePlaying) callback.
You need to call this method after and receiving the OnAudioMixingStateChanged(AUDIO_MIXING_STATE_PLAYING) callback.

ul.li: ≥ 0: Success. Returns the duration of the music file.
< 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
≥ 0: Success. Returns the duration of the music file.
< 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
≥ 0: The method call succeeds and returns the duration of the music file.
< 0: The method call fails. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
≥ 0: Success. Returns the duration of the music file.
< 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
